content:
{"name": "St. Clement's Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- St. Clement's Food Pantry is a pick-up and go bag of groceries
- . The bags are packed by volunteers and given out to registered clients. 
- When clients register they need to give a name but no address, and the number of people in the family. Bags are packed for family of one, two, three,  then they are called to pick up the food.
- Tghe address is 423 W. 46th Street, between 9th and 10th Ave.", "email": "", "url": "www.stclementsnyc.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "423 West 46th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10036", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7615741, "longitude": -73.9915196}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 246-7277", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "11:30", "closes_at": "13:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "04:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}]}
